data.message: Hi " My name is "  "The real Slim Shady" "Rain Man " or  "Marshall Mathers"   i  "Love the way you lie " because you are  "Beautiful " i am a  "Survival " i can " Drop the world " better than "Superman" because i am " Like a toy soldier" i was living on " 8 mile " . You will be scared at " 3 am "  "Without me " , please dont  "Lose yourself " , "Just lose it" !

replies.message: Who is slim shaddy? And marshal matters? Lol never herd of those guys.
And how can you be a survival
Making his hits into a complete train of thought, awesome!

This sends me into "berzerk" mode/
So i might just "loose it" if you try to"loose yourself" you wack job toad/
My mind is " space bound" so galactic like mr.fantastics fantastic ability to stretch my thought/
And so you know im "not afraid" to slay my enemies through black and "white amerika" sparking my skill through "8 mile" road/
So though "my name is' not "the real slim shady" i can still "superman" your asses in this "fastlane" bro.

But yours was cool too.

" My name is " " The real Slim Shaddy " "Rain Man " or " Marshal Matters "  i " "Love the way you lie " because you are  "Beautiful " i am a  "Soldier " i can " Drop the world " because i am " Like a toy soldier" i was living on " 8 mile " . You will be scared at " 3 am " "without me " , please dont " Lose yourself " ** makes more sense
First of all its not "loose yourself"  it's lose...  Secondly it's not matters it's Mathers Lolol learn to spell before trying to rap
Why do so many people in this world exist who can't fucking spell 'lose'
